TSyslogSend.Facility
TSyslogSend     

property Facility: Byte;

Unit
SLogSend

Description
Define facilicity of Syslog message. For specify you may use predefined constants. Default is "FCL_Local0".

Constants are:
FCL_Kernel = 0;
FCL_UserLevel = 1;
FCL_MailSystem = 2;
FCL_System = 3;
FCL_Security = 4;
FCL_Syslogd = 5;
FCL_Printer = 6;
FCL_News = 7;
FCL_UUCP = 8;
FCL_Clock = 9;
FCL_Authorization = 10;
FCL_FTP = 11;
FCL_NTP = 12;
FCL_LogAudit = 13;
FCL_LogAlert = 14;
FCL_Time = 15;
FCL_Local0 = 16;
FCL_Local1 = 17;
FCL_Local2 = 18;
FCL_Local3 = 19;
FCL_Local4 = 20;
FCL_Local5 = 21;
FCL_Local6 = 22;
FCL_Local7 = 23;


See also:
